description:
Cherries Jubalie is a pain slut who is very obedient. She is put through her paces by my friend Felony who takes the reins for the first time (for our cameras) and show Cherries what it is like to submit to a fellow pain slut. The last scene is a turnaround as Felony is bound & made to squirt all over herself & Cherries.
After the shoot was over, these two woman were literally inseparable and we caught all the footage just for you.
title: Submission to pain..... Cherries & Felony
